Is this article primarily about a new action or announcement by the Trump administration/White House/Executive? Respond simply with "yes" or "no" .
President Donald Trump just signed executive orders declaring a “national energy emergency” and “unleashing” domestic fossil...
President Donald Trump just signed executive orders declaring a “national energy emergency” and “unleashing” domestic fossil fuel production. It was not immediately clear what government actions the energy emergency would entail, although Trump allies have suggested the order could allow the administration to quickly approve pipelines and other fossil fuel infrastructure.
